newsitem.title: POLAND: IB AUSTRIA SEES BFK 97 NET AT PLN 34 MLN.
newsitem.headline: IB AUSTRIA SEES BFK 97 NET AT PLN 34 MLN.

text.p: The net profit of the Polish cable maker Bydgoskie Fabryki Kabli should rise to 34 million zlotys this year and 42 million in 1998 from 24.3 million in 1996, IB Austria Securities said in its February report.
It predicted the company's sales would increase to 450 million zlotys this year and 540 million in 1998 from 364.5 million zlotys in 1996.

IB Austria also said the dynamics of BFK's profits would be difficult to sustain because increasing domestic and foreign competition in the sector might force the firm to cut its current high sales margins. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
